resources.string:
1. Minimum withdrawal amount is 200RS
2. Withdrawal time: Monday to Friday 10:00am-05:30pm
3. Cash withdrawal fee is 8
4. Do not rush your manager within 48 hours of application submission. Once you submit your withdrawal, the bank is queuing up to process it for you. If your withdrawal has not been received within 48 hours, please contact your manager for enquiry 
5. IFSC should be 11 characters and the fifth character should be 0, not O. If you fill in incorrect bank information, your withdrawal will fail.
